Koga Shuko/Unitron:

::Shuko yelled, as a few more asteroids slammed into the side of the ship, 
one ripping through, taking out a piece of the engines::
::A huge fire broke out in the main engine room, personel with fire retardent 
flames trying to put out the fire, but it was spreading to fast::
"Killer, inform the ship that we will be entering the planet's gravitational 
pull in one cycle.  In the mean time, seal the bridge with the special metal, 
as well as the cargo bays.  We won't get ripped to shreds or explode that 
way."
